GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an array of a review when provided a review_id in place of :review_id

reviews.title: JengARRGGGH!
reviews.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family, this game needs little explaination. Whether you're a player who chooses to play it safe, or one who lives life on the edge, eventually the removal of blocks will destabilise the tower and all your Jenga dreams come tumbling down.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of usernames from the users table

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

reviews.title: JengARRGGGH!
reviews.review_body: Few games are equiped to fill a player with such a defined sense of mild-peril, but a friendly game of Jenga will turn the mustn't-make-it-fall anxiety all the way up to 11! Fiddly fun for all the family, this game needs little explaination. Whether you're a player who chooses to play it safe, or one who lives life on the edge, eventually the removal of blocks will destabilise the tower and all your Jenga dreams come tumbling down.

GET /api/users/:username.description: Provides username, avatar_url and name of a given user

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id: Will provide the ability to both upvote and downvote reviews
POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments: Will provide functionality to add a comment to a review when providing review_id
DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id: Will provide functionality to remove a comment from the table with a provided comment_id
